title: Annual Water Loss Audit
description: A water resource manager is conducting an annual water audit to calculate the amount of non-revenue water (NRW) in the system.

tasks.description: Calculate the total volume of water supplied into the distribution system over the past year.
tasks.expected_outcome: System computes the total volume of water produced.

tasks.description: Calculate the total volume of water billed to all customers over the same period.
tasks.expected_outcome: System computes the total volume of water sold.

tasks.description: Calculate the non-revenue water percentage by subtracting billed volume from supplied volume.
tasks.expected_outcome: System determines the water loss is 15%.

tasks.description: Benchmark the result against industry averages and recommend further action if the loss is high.
tasks.expected_outcome: System notes that 15% is above the industry average and recommends an expanded leak detection program.
